title: Navigational Tracking Mitigations
summary: Brief overview of existing and proposed navigational tracking mitigations. Will include discussion of chrome's new work on [bounce tracking mitigations](https://github.com/wanderview/bounce-tracking-mitigations/blob/main/explainer.md). Follow-on discussion will be collaborative to discuss use cases, what is working or not working, and ideas for the future.
goals: Capture the current state of navigational tracking and highlight future proposals. Solicit problems and use cases from site operators.
